casebody.data:
State of North Carolina
v.
Curtis Louis Sangster No. 84P15-4 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 8, 2016. Mr. Curtis Louis Sangster, Pro Se. Mr. Robert C. Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, Ms. N. Lorrin Freeman, District Attorney, For State of N.C.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 2nd of September 2016 in this matter for a writ of mandamus, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court, Wake County:

"Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 8th of December 2016."
